title: Valerio Mastrantonio
text:
Valerio Mastrantonio (born 22 June 1999) is an Italian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="A.S.%20Cittadella">Cittadella</a>.
Club career.
He started playing on the Under-19 level for <a href="Frosinone%20Calcio">Frosinone</a>. In November 2017, he was called up twice to their senior squad for <a href="2017%E2%80%9318%20Serie%20B">Serie B</a> games, but remained on the bench. He spent the first two seasons of his senior career on loan at the <a href="Serie%20D">Serie D</a> club Monterosi.
On 13 August 2020, he joined <a href="Serie%20B">Serie B</a> club <a href="A.S.%20Cittadella">Cittadella</a>. He made his Serie B debut for Cittadella on 20 October 2020 in a game against <a href="Pordenone%20Calcio">Pordenone</a>. He substituted <a href="Mario%20Gargiulo">Mario Gargiulo</a> in added time.
